description: Isonemal fabrics of period exactly n.
references: B. Gruenbaum and G. C. Shephard, The geometry of fabrics, pp. 77-98 of F. C. Holroyd and R. J. Wilson, editors, Geometrical Combinatorics. Pitman, Boston, 1984.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _Simon Plouffe_
